'''Sunset Loach''' is a type of loach that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Loach Pearl|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Currently, Sunset Loaches can only be found on [[Watatsumi Island]], [[Inazuma]].

<gallery>
Wildlife Sunset Loach Location 1.png|Location
</gallery>

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=300 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
